alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:44AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Bay County through 1230 PM EDT/1130 AM CDT/... At 1144 AM EDT/1044 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Lynn Haven to Springfield. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Gainer Spring, Bennett, Youngstown, Brannonville, Millville, Vicksburg and Majette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
